title: PHPstr_repeat()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPstr_repeat()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Repeat the string "Wow" 13 times:
<?php
echo str_repeat("Wow",13);
?>

Definition and Usage
The str_repeat() function repeats a string a specified number of times.
Syntax
str_repeat(
string,repeat
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. Specifies the string to repeat
repeat
Required. Specifies the number of times the string will be repeated. Must be greater or equal to 0
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the repeated string
PHP Version:
4+

★
+1
